languages.text: "{name}?" {n}Тонкая фигура Кассии на мгновение напрягается, в глазах проскальзывает незнакомое выражение.{/n} "Позвольте отблагодарить династию фон Валанциус за помощь, которой удостоился Дом Орселлио. И лично вас. Незаменимые жизненные уроки, что я получила во время совместных странствий, позволили мне стать той, кем мне суждено было стать".

traits.locale_text: "{name}?" {n}Тонкая фигура Кассии на мгновение напрягается, в глазах проскальзывает незнакомое выражение.{/n} "Позвольте отблагодарить династию фон Валанциус за помощь, которой удостоился Дом Орселлио. И лично вас. Незаменимые жизненные уроки, что я получила во время совместных странствий, позволили мне стать той, кем мне суждено было стать".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}?" {n}Cassia's thin figure tenses for a moment, and an unfamiliar expression passes fleetingly over her face.{/n} "Allow me to thank the von Valancius dynasty for the help it graciously extended to House Orsellio. And to thank you personally. The fundamental life lessons I learned during our journeys together have allowed me to become who I was destined to be."
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Тонкая фигура Кассии на мгновение напрягается, в глазах проскальзывает незнакомое выражение.{/n} "Позвольте отблагодарить династию фон Валанциус за помощь, которой удостоился Дом Орселлио. And to thank you personally. The fundamental life lessons I learned during our journeys together have allowed me to become who I was destined to be."

languages.text: “{name}?”{n}卡西娅瘦削的身影紧张了片刻，某种你从未见过的表情在她脸上一闪而过。{/n}“请允许我感谢冯·瓦兰修斯王朝对奥赛罗家族的慷慨协助。就我个人而言，我也要感谢你。我在与你同行的旅程中学到了很多重要的生活知识，帮助我成为我注定会成为的人。”
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Cassia's thin figure tenses for a moment, and an unfamiliar expression passes fleetingly over her face.{/n} "Allow me to thank the von Valancius dynasty for the help it graciously extended to House Orsellio. And to thank you personally. The fundamental life lessons I learned during our journeys together have allowed me to become who I was destined to be."

traits.locale_text: “{name}?”{n}卡西娅瘦削的身影紧张了片刻，某种你从未见过的表情在她脸上一闪而过。{/n}“请允许我感谢冯·瓦兰修斯王朝对奥塞罗家族的慷慨协助。就我个人而言，我也要感谢你。我在与你同行的旅程中学到了很多重要的生活知识，帮助我成为我注定会成为的人。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "?" {n}Cassia's thin figure tenses for a moment, and an unfamiliar expression passes fleetingly over her face.{/n} "Allow me to thank the von Valancius dynasty for the help it graciously extended to House Orsellio. And to thank you personally. The fundamental life lessons I learned during our journeys together have allowed me to become who I was destined to be."

languages.text: «¿{name}?». {n}La esbelta figura se tensa por un momento y una expresión que no reconoces atraviesa su cara fugazmente.{/n} «Permítame que agradezca a la dinastía von Valancius la ayuda brindada a la casa Orsellio. Y que le dé las gracias personalmente. La lecciones esenciales que he aprendido en nuestros viajes me han permitido convertirme en quien debía ser».
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Cassia's thin figure tenses for a moment, and an unfamiliar expression passes fleetingly over her face.{/n} "Allow me to thank the von Valancius dynasty for the help it graciously extended to House Orsellio. And to thank you personally. The fundamental life lessons I learned during our journeys together have allowed me to become who I was destined to be."

traits.locale_text: «¿{name}?» {n}La esbelta figura se tensa por un momento y una expresión que no reconoces atraviesa su cara fugazmente.{/n} «Permítame que agradezca a la dinastía von Valancius la ayuda brindada a la casa Orsellio. Y que le dé las gracias personalmente. La lecciones esenciales que he aprendido en nuestros viajes me han permitido convertirme en quien debía ser».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}？」{n} カシアの細い姿が一瞬緊張し、見慣れない表情が浮かぶ。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝がオーセリオ家を快く助けてくれたことに感謝します。そして、個人的にお礼を言わせてください。一緒に旅をする中で学んだことは、私が運命づけられていた自分になることを可能にしてくれたのですから」
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Cassia's thin figure tenses for a moment, and an unfamiliar expression passes fleetingly over her face.{/n} "Allow me to thank the von Valancius dynasty for the help it graciously extended to House Orsellio. And to thank you personally. The fundamental life lessons I learned during our journeys together have allowed me to become who I was destined to be."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}？」{n} カシアの細い姿が一瞬緊張し、見慣れない表情が浮かぶ。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝がオーセリオ家を快く助けてくれたことに感謝します。そして、個人的にお礼を言わせてください。一緒に旅をする中で学んだことは、私が運命づけられていた自分になることを可能にしてくれたのですから」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}?" {n}Cassias dünne Gestalt versteift sich kurz und ein ungewohnter Ausdruck huscht über ihr Gesicht.{/n} "Gestattet mir, der Dynastie von Valancius für die Hilfe zu danken, die sie Haus Orsellio freundlicherweise angeboten hat. Und auch Euch persönlich zu danken. Ich habe auf unseren gemeinsamen Reisen grundlegende Dinge über das Leben gelernt. Das hat mir erlaubt, die zu werden, die ich werden bestimmt war."
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Cassia's thin figure tenses for a moment, and an unfamiliar expression passes fleetingly over her face.{/n} "Allow me to thank the von Valancius dynasty for the help it graciously extended to House Orsellio. And to thank you personally. The fundamental life lessons I learned during our journeys together have allowed me to become who I was destined to be."

traits.locale_text: "{name}?" {n}Cassias dünne Gestalt versteift sich kurz und ein ungewohnter Ausdruck huscht über ihr Gesicht.{/n} "Gestattet mir, der Dynastie von Valancius für die Hilfe zu danken, die sie Haus Orsellio freundlicherweise angeboten hat. Und auch Euch persönlich zu danken. Ich habe auf unseren gemeinsamen Reisen grundlegende Dinge über das Leben gelernt. Das hat mir erlaubt, die zu werden, die ich werden bestimmt war."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {name} ? »{n}La silhouette filiforme de Cassia se raidit un instant tandis qu'une expression que vous ne lui aviez encore jamais vue passe fugacement sur son visage.{/n} « Permettez-moi d'exprimer toute ma gratitude envers la dynastie von Valancius pour l'aide qu'elle a apportée à la maison Orsellio. Et de vous remercier, vous, personnellement. Les leçons fondamentales que j'ai apprises lors de nos voyages m'ont permis de devenir celle que j'étais destinée à être. »
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Cassia's thin figure tenses for a moment, and an unfamiliar expression passes fleetingly over her face.{/n} "Allow me to thank the von Valancius dynasty for the help it graciously extended to House Orsellio. And to thank you personally. The fundamental life lessons I learned during our journeys together have allowed me to become who I was destined to be."

traits.locale_text: « {name} ? »{n}La silhouette filiforme de Cassia se raidit un instant tandis qu'une expression que vous ne lui aviez encore jamais vue passe fugacement sur son visage.{/n} « Permettez-moi d'exprimer toute ma gratitude envers la dynastie von Valancius pour l'aide qu'elle a apportée à la maison Orsellio. Et de vous remercier, vous, personnellement. Les leçons fondamentales que j'ai apprises lors de nos voyages m'ont permis de devenir celle que j'étais destinée à être. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sen mi geldin {name}?" {n}Bir anlığına Cassia'nın ince vücudu gerilip yüzünde sana tanıdık gelmeyen bir ifade beliriyor.{/n} "Müsaadenle von Valancius hanedanlığına teşekkür etmek isterim. Orsellio Hanesi'ne nazikçe yardım eli uzattınız. Şahsen sana da teşekkürü borç bilirim. Birlikte geçen seyahatlerimizde öğrendiğim mühim hayat dersleri, alın yazımı kovalamama olanak sağladı."
languages.original_text: "{name}?" {n}Cassia's thin figure tenses for a moment, and an unfamiliar expression passes fleetingly over her face.{/n} "Allow me to thank the von Valancius dynasty for the help it graciously extended to House Orsellio. And to thank you personally. The fundamental life lessons I learned during our journeys together have allowed me to become who I was destined to be."

traits.locale_text: "Sen mi geldin {name}?" {n}Bir anlığına Cassia'nın ince vücudu geriliyor ve yüzünde sana tanıdık gelmeyen bir ifade beliriyor.{/n} "Müsaadenle von Valancius hanedanlığına teşekkür etmek isterim. Orsellio Hanesi'ne nazikçe yardım eli uzattınız. Şahsen sana da teşekkürü bir borç bilirim. Birlikte geçen seyahatlerimizde öğrendiğim mühim hayat dersleri, alın yazımın peşine düşmeme olanak sağladı."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
